topic.title: Node?
topic.body: So one thing I don't understand about all this is... where does server code go. Is all my code going to be available to everyone who downloads the site? How do permissions work?

topic.title: Web-Devs, Bounce some Ideas
topic.body:
Anyone willing to bounce some ideas with me, we can talk on an IRC

https://kiwiirc.com/client/irc.freenode.net/zeronet
or even
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Board.ZeroNetwork.bit/

Just somewhere any web-dev is willing to help me think some ideas through!

2_1FEikAyxCNPJcW996B69r5UFg29yfq579m.body:
This looks great... any chance we will get iOS support?

Also you should make a website to garner a user-base, let me know if you need help with that.

1_1LE1ngFyG62KJC1Q7G2xyZGjaB2QubXSi9.body:
One idea is having the network create backups.

I was thinking after a certain time span, or amount of posts or whatever... the data gets compressed and spread through the network with  no way to delete remotely.
